subject: Pro x pedal and vam pro motors
description_text:
Hello I have a set of pro x pedals and I purchased a set of the vam pro haptic reactors.

After purchasing them I saw the note on the website about they are for the ultra and the plus. My question is can I just buy the pro x ultra control box with my pedals?
It also says I can upgrade the software and control box firmware with my current setup but won't work as well. Is that true? I've tried everything and I can't get them to work, I even tried to use simhub to control them and nothings working.
If you could let me know what I should do to make them work I'd appreciate it.
Thanks


Steve McCormick
MPG Motorsports
7561 Tyler Blvd Unit 3
Mentor OH 44060
440-563-1025
WWW.MPGMOTORSPORTS.COM




Thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Steven McCormick,    In the “Settings – Update” section, click “Manual Firmware Update,” then navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals folder → and select the prox.sfu file to update. After the update, please test the device again.

Just did it. It works now. If I upgrade the control box
To the pro x ultra will they be stronger?
Thank you for your help

Steve McCormick
MPG Motorsports
7561 Tyler Blvd Unit 3
Mentor OH 44060
440-563-1025
WWW.MPGMOTORSPORTS.COM




Thank you
________________________________
Hi Steven McCormick,    Upgrading to the Ultra control box will provide stronger force feedback.  However, if you’re already satisfied with the current strength, there’s no need to upgrade!
